level.heading: TRANSFER AND MODIFICATION OF LICENSES (ยง 24-604)

level.text: 604.1 Upon any change in the ownership, management, or mailing address of theicensed business, the parking facility licensee shall immediately notify theirector of that fact.

604.2 The new owner, resident general agent, or attorney, as the case may be,hall be responsible for the conduct of the business after a change in ownershipr management and shall, in a timely manner, file a new application with theirector.
